messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Warren is offering a real alternative to the failed political class that let down Leeds. With real world experience and nearly 30 years removed from the politics that have let you down, Warren believes that the most important voices in politics and policies should be yours. It's time to sweep away the failed Lib, Lab & Con parties by voting for Warren Hendon on May 7. Vote UKIP, get UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to live, work, and settle here.
UKIP will invest an extra £3 billion a year into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.health: UKIP will invest an extra £3 billion a year into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to live, work, and settle here.

housing.content: UKIP will SCRAP the bedroom tax

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, Warren is offering a real alternative to the failed political class that have let down Leeds. With real world experience to bring to Westminster politics, having lived in the constituency for nearly 20 years. Warren believes that the most important voices in politics and policies should be yours. It's time to sweep away the failed Lib, Lab & Con parties by voting for Warren Hendon on May 7. Vote UKIP, get UKIP.

images.caption: Photograph of Warren Hendon, UKIP candidate for Leeds North East
